creator: edwin@bitstorm.org
text:
There are no 1.3.x-binaries available for Solaris versions later than 2.8.

2.0.x-binaries does exist for Solaris 8, but sometimes a 1.3.x-binary
is desirable. For example when using PHP, which for now only has
beta-quality support for Apache 2.0.

Our policy on binaries is described here:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/misc/FAQ.html#binaries

Essentially, we do the best that we can, but we consider the source
distribution to be the official apache, and we expect our users to
use this.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: slive@apache.org
slive@apache.org
text: *** Bug 11538 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
